name: Sampler
tagline: Visualizing EMF models has never been so cool.
body:
### Welcome to SAMPLER Page.
Here you will find some information about the SAMPLER tool and its progress. You can read the basic information abut how install and run the plug-in, find some examples, and check the new features of SAMPLER.

Enjoy SAMPLER, and visualize models!

##Documentation
Here you have the JavaDoc website for each Feature included in this WebSite:
* Documentation for [Rioko Utilities Feature](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/RiokoDoc/Utils/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER Basic Tools](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerTools/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER Saving Displays](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerSavingDisplay/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER Spectral Tools](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerSpectralTools/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER Layouts Wrapper](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerLayoutWrapper/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER EMF](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerEMF/index.html).
* Documentation for [SAMPLER GraphML](http://antonio-jp.github.io/sampler/javadoc/SamplerDoc/SamplerGraphML/index.html).

## Update Site
The stable version of SAMPLER can be download from this [Update Site (stable)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Antonio-JP/sampler/release-4/sampler.update.site/site.xml)

There is a newer version (but unestable) of SAMPLER ready to be installed from this [Update Site (newest)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Antonio-JP/sampler/master/sampler.update.site/site.xml)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
